patient_profile.description: Understands some medical concepts, asks informed questions

rounds.conversation_goal: Initial assessment. Patient reports mild shortness of breath with exertion and mild evening leg swelling. Weight up 2 lbs. BP 118/72 mmHg, HR 68 bpm. Patient missed a couple doses of Metoprolol. Recommend increasing Losartan to 100mg daily.

Follow-up after Losartan increase. Patient reports increased shortness of breath and worsening leg swelling. Weight up 3 lbs (now 157 lbs). BP 110/70 mmHg, HR 65 bpm. Patient admits missing multiple doses of Losartan and Metoprolol. Recommend increasing Metoprolol to 150mg daily.

Declining adherence. Patient reports severe fatigue, worsening shortness of breath, persistent leg swelling, and new orthopnea. Weight up 5 lbs (now 162 lbs). BP 102/68 mmHg, HR 60 bpm, O2 93%. Patient admits missing several doses of multiple medications. Address adherence crisis.

patient_profile.description: Uses simple language, may misunderstand medical terms, asks basic questions

rounds.conversation_goal: Initial check-in. Patient reports mild shortness of breath and persistent swelling (+3lbs weight gain). Inquire about adherence and side effects. BP 125/80 mmHg, HR 70 bpm. Good adherence. Recommend increasing Entresto to 49/51mg BID.

Follow-up after Entresto increase. Patient tolerating well, minimal symptoms. Weight stable. BP 120/75 mmHg, HR 68 bpm. Perfect adherence. Recommend increasing Metoprolol to 100mg daily and Eplerenone to 50mg daily.

Follow-up. Patient tolerating Entresto well. Minimal symptoms. BP 120/75 mmHg, HR 68 bpm. Good adherence. Recommend increasing Metoprolol to 50mg daily and Dapagliflozin to 10mg daily.
Continued progress. Patient feeling better overall. Weight stable. BP 118/72 mmHg, HR 65 bpm. Excellent adherence. Recommend increasing Entresto to 97/103mg BID and Eplerenone to 50mg daily.
